All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPF
    This abstract class has implementations for the flexible portfolio.
    AbstractWrite
    This abstract class is used to write the XML values into the portfolio based on the type (flexible or inflexible).
    APICaller
    This class makes call to the Alpha-vantage API and retrieves valid dates (market open and closed dates).
    ControlValidations
    This class tracks all the validation checks to be performed by the model on inputs from the user.
    DataSource
    This interface is responsible for fetching the stock prices from a data source (API) on a date.
    DataSourceAPI
    This class has the implementation to switch between various data sources (CSV or API).
    DollarCostAvg
    This class has methods which will calculate the amount of money to be invested in a particular stock depending on the percentage of money the user has chosen to invest their money into.
    Features
    This interface contains all the features to be performed when working with the GUI.
    FlexiblePF
    This class extends the AbstractPF class and calls the view to display the submenu for the flexible portfolios.
    Graph
    This class has the implementations to print the performance of a portfolio over a range of time.
    InflexiblePF
    This class displays the submenu for the Inflexible portfolios.
    InvestmentStrategies
    This interface consists of methods which will handle the dates of investment for any type of investment strategy as and when required.
    InvestmentStrategiesImpl
    This class implements the InvestmentStrategies interface.
    LineChartView
    This class contains implementation to draw a performance graph (line chart).
    Model
    This interface is the model interface for the Stocks application.
    ModelImpl
    ModelImpl implements the Model interface.
    ModelTest
    A JUnit test class to test the StockModel.
    Portfolio
    This interface has the implementations to operate on a portfolio .
    PortfolioImpl
    This class has the implementations to operate on a portfolio .
    PriceList
    This class has the implementations to read the stock prices and update values for total, cost basis and performance of a portfolio over a certain time range.
    ReadPortfolio
    This class is used to read the values from the portfolio given the values of the ticker symbols and the number of stocks.
    StockController
    This interface is the controller interface for the Stocks application.
    StockControllerGUIImpl
    This class implements the Features and StockControllerGUI interface.
    StockControllerImpl
    This class implements the stockController interface.
    StockMain
    stockMain that is the main function for the Stocks Application.
    StockView
    This is the view interface for the Stocks application.
    StockViewImpl
    stockViewImpl implements the stockview interface.
    StockViewTest
    A JUnit test class to test the StockView.
    Validator
    This interface has the implementations to check various fields such as stocks, dates, portfolio names and ticker symbols.
    ValidatorImpl
    This class has the implementations to check various fields such as stocks, dates, portfolio names and ticker symbols.
    ViewGUI
    This is the view GUI interface for the Stocks application.
    ViewGUIImpl
    This class extends the JFrame class and implements the ViewGUI interface and ActionListener class.
    WritePFNameXML
    This class is used to write the values into the XML given the values of the portfolio like ticker symbols and the number of stocks.
    WriteStockDetailsXML
    This class extends the AbstractWrite class to write the stock details of a portfolio into the XML.
